page.title: 16A Domesday Survey (cont)
page.content:
4.Do people shoplift and what do they take? 5.How many people work for you? 6.Why do you open on Sundays? 7.You ALWAYS have a sale. Why? 8.How long has the shop been open? 9.How many people shop after work? 10.Is there a favourite evening for shopping? 11.How many days of the year are you open? 12.Which day is the worst for trade?
B&Q CUSTOMER QUESTIONS. _______________________ 1.Do you like the goods? 2.Is there enough parking space? 3.Are prices reasonable? 4.How often do you come here? 5.How did you travel? {Answers obtained from Vyner Primary {School,Bidston.(051_652_7093)
